context.p: You can use your phone to play MP3 music files. Use the provided headphones, or you can supply your own headphones with a 1/8-inch stereo jack.

step.cmd: Plug your headphones into the headphone jack.
Press the menu key, and choose music library.
Click the volume buttons to adjust the music volume up or down., and choose
Scroll through the list of songs with the arrow keys. Click o.k. to play a song. Your phone will continue to play the songs in your library, in order, until you click end.
